Concept that is being invoiced, according to the catalog defined by Airbus.
It is a text that briefly describes the invoice. Being a field short, the provider should make sure to clearly indicate the concept.
It is the purchase order number in the customer system.
It is receiving number in the customer system.
It is the remission number or delivery note of the supplier.
The type of operation is indicated, if it is IMPORT or EXPORT. Required for expense accounts / notes position.
Indicate the attached file if necessary.

invoice = env['account.invoice'].browse(model._context['invoice_id']) wizard = env['x_addenda.airbus'].browse(model._context['active_id']) if wizard.x_reception_num: wizard_fields = [wizard.x_concept, wizard.x_description, wizard.x_purchase_order, wizard.x_reception_num, wizard.x_delivery_num, wizard.x_type_operation] wizard_fields = [j or '' for j in wizard_fields] invoice.write({'x_addenda_airbus': '|'.join(wizard_fields)})
# Create supplier info for addenda values, if theyre not already created for line in invoice.invoice_line_ids: if not any([line.x_addenda_sap_code, line.x_addenda_sap_uom]): continue supplier_info = line.sudo().product_id.seller_ids.filtered( lambda s: s.name == invoice.commercial_partner_id and s.product_id == line.product_id and s.sequence == 1000)[:1] if supplier_info: supplier_info.write({ 'product_code': line.x_addenda_sap_code, 'x_addenda_uom_code': line.x_addenda_sap_uom, }) else: supplier_info.create({ 'name': invoice.commercial_partner_id.id, 'product_tmpl_id': line.product_id.product_tmpl_id.id, 'product_id': line.product_id.id, 'sequence': 1000, 'product_code': line.x_addenda_sap_code, 'x_addenda_uom_code': line.x_addenda_sap_uom, })
# Create attachment if wizard.x_attached_file: fname = ("Addenda Airbus - %s" % (invoice.id)) atts = env['ir.attachment'].sudo().search([ ('res_model', '=', invoice._name), ('name', '=', fname), ('res_id', '=', invoice.id), ]) mimetype = atts._compute_mimetype({'datas': wizard.x_attached_file}) if atts: atts.write({'datas': b64encode(wizard.x_attached_file), 'mimetype': mimetype}) else: data_attach = { 'name': fname, 'datas': b64encode(wizard.x_attached_file), 'type': 'binary', 'mimetype': mimetype, 'res_model': invoice._name, 'res_id': invoice.id, } atts.create(data_attach) xml_signed = invoice.l10n_mx_edi_cfdi if xml_signed: invoice.l10n_mx_edi_append_addenda(xml_signed)

li.p: Concept that is being invoiced, according to the catalog defined by Airbus.
Text that briefly describes the invoice.
The number of the customer's purchase order. This value is taken from the invoice's field "Reference/Description".
It is receiving number in the customer system.
It is the remission number or delivery note of the supplier.
Sap Sequence: Position of the item in the purchase order.
Material: Airbus material number, when it is material or consumables (optional).
UoM: Airbus Helicopters unit of measure.
Indicate the attached file if necessary (optional).
Required for expense accounts / notes position with customs (optional).
The number of the invoice's pedimentos. This value is taken from the invoice line's field "Customs number" (optional).

record.field: Set default values for the addenda Airbus

context = { 'invoice_id': record.id, 'default_x_purchase_order': record.name, 'default_x_invoice_line_ids': record.invoice_line_ids.ids, } wizard_values = record.x_addenda_airbus and record.x_addenda_airbus.split('|') # If the wizard has been run before, fill it with its previows values if wizard_values: context.update({ 'default_x_concept': wizard_values[0], 'default_x_description': wizard_values[1], 'default_x_purchase_order': wizard_values[2], 'default_x_reception_num': wizard_values[3], 'default_x_delivery_num': wizard_values[4], 'default_x_type_operation': wizard_values[5], })
# Set default SAP values if available as supplier info for line in record.invoice_line_ids: supplier_info = line.sudo().product_id.seller_ids.filtered( lambda s: s.name == record.commercial_partner_id and s.product_id == line.product_id and s.sequence == 1000)[:1] line.write({ 'x_addenda_sap_sequence': line.x_addenda_sap_sequence, 'x_addenda_sap_code': line.x_addenda_sap_code or supplier_info.product_code, 'x_addenda_sap_uom': line.x_addenda_sap_uom or supplier_info.x_addenda_uom_code, })
action = env.ref('l10n_mx_edi_addendas.action_addenda_airbus').read()[0] action['context'] = context
